item_one.title: General
item_one.description: General settings such as, site title, site description, address and so on.

item_two.title: Currencies
item_two.description: Manage various types of currencies that you are going to use in the system.

item_three.title: Units
item_three.description: Manage unit types for measurement that you're going to use in the system.

item_four.title: Role & Permissions
item_four.description: Manage Roles & Permissions for users who are going to use the system.

item_five.title: VAT Rates
item_five.description: Manage VAT rates for VAT management that you're going to use in the system.

item_six.title: Brands
item_six.description: Manage brands that you're going to use in the system.

item_seven.title: Payment Methods
item_seven.description: Manage payment methods that you're going to use in the system.

item_eight.title: User Permissions
item_eight.description: Manage permission that you're going to assign in a role.

item_nine.title: Mail Configurations
item_nine.description: Manage your mail configuration such as HOST, USERNAME, PASSWORD etc.

item_ten.title: SMS Configurations
item_ten.description: Manage your sms configuration such as TWILIO ACCOUNT SID, TWILIO FROM etc.
